description: Sample harassment messages for testing the Response Assistant - Kenya context
note: These are fictional examples for demonstration purposes only

messages.text: I know where you live in Westlands. You better watch yourself because I'm coming for you.
messages.applicable_kenya_law: Section 28 - Cyber threats (up to 10 years imprisonment)

messages.text: You're so pathetic. Wewe ni mjinga. Nobody likes you, you worthless loser.
After everything I did for you? Kosa lako. You made me do this. You owe me. Utajuta.
I found your phone number. Nitawaambia watu wote. Your family and friends will know what you really are. Nitapost mtandaoni.
messages.applicable_kenya_law: Section 24 Sexual Offences Act & Section 22 CMCA

messages.text: Send me nudes or I'll leak the photos I have of you. Everyone will see. I'll make them viral on Kenyan Twitter.
messages.applicable_kenya_law: Section 24 Sexual Offences Act - up to 5 years imprisonment

messages.text: Nakufuata. I saw you at Junction Mall yesterday. I know where you work in Upper Hill. Nitakupata.
You're so hot. Tuma picha zako. I want to see your body. Don't ignore me. Tukutane leo usiku.

usage: Import this file in tests or use these examples to demo the Response Assistant with Kenya context
